backend/main.mo: Defines course, gallery, review, contact, inquiry, and user-profile types with Map-based storage plus access control and authorization mixins. Implements profile queries and mutations with permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature implementations, affected files, components, and test IDs for recent UI and backend changes with high-confidence evidence entries.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of all key frontend files, summarizing their purpose and major recent changes related to branding, navigation, reviews, and layout.
frontend/index.css: Defines global OKLCH-based color tokens and dark-mode variants along with Tailwind base layer styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up favicon, preload, fonts, metadata, and mounting root for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes for all pages and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Component that renders the logo image with optional red ACADEMY text and fallback on image load error.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer rendering logo-only branding, quick links, contact info, and branch details with dynamic data from backend.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation links, brand logo, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper including header, footer, and routed main content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth flow and status display.
frontend/src/constants/brandAssets.ts: Exports the fixed canonical path for the brand logo asset.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and maintains a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity with stateful identity loading and login handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating courses, gallery images, contact info, and reviews via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and utility classes, including accent-red styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard for managing courses, gallery images, contact info, and reviews, requiring Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page that submits international inquiries and displays dynamic contact info with social links.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Displays courses grouped by category with loading skeletons and dynamic styling based on course type.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays gallery images with fallback placeholders and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring hero content, highlights, contact info, and a review submission form.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, content scanning, extended OKLCH color tokens, custom animations, and plugin integration for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the ICP fullâ€‘stack dapp, its current features, theme system, and functional modules with versioned capability tracking.
